title: Ticket #4870: Language in DAGMAN_SUPPRESS_NOTIFICATION description is misleading
description: In the manual, the DAGMAN_SUPPRESS_NOTIFICATION description says, "Defaults to True, implementing behavior in which the user receives one notification email when the condor_dagman job completes..." However, the default is that you don't get an email when DAGMan completes, and the DAGMAN_SUPPRESS_NOTIFICATION setting has no effect on this.
check_ins: 2015-Feb-10 12:21   Check-in [43288]: correct defn of knob DAGMAN_SUPPRESS_NOTIFICATION #4870 (By Karen Miller )
creator: wenger
